posts.post_content:
Posted By: Brian H (misunderestimated)
Three Beautiful cards with great images (2 of the backs are less nice) All three were exceptional players.  Stovey probably should be in the HOF.

PSA 7 (Highest PSA Graded OJ of Stovey 1/2) - Harry Stovey $2550 -- goes on eBay  Sunday night  May 11.
SGC 50 - Herman (Germany) Long $360 -- goes on eBay Thurs. PM May 15.
SGC 50 - Arlie Latham ("The freshest man on earth) SOLD

Rules: price includes shipping/insurance. Paypal accepted at no additional charge.
First to contact me at bhodes@rcn.com accepting the terms (ie price) gets priority.
